div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1203 Chalki, island near Rhodes, 1903 (234) Burial: c. 380 B.C. (M) Contents: 208 AR Athens: 1 triob. Chios: 1 didr.; 81 tetrob. Samos: 5 tetradr. Rhodes: 120 hemidr. Disposition,: Istanbul Schlumberger, L'argent grec, p. 8, no. 3 Barron, Samos, p. 116
